firstName.description: The first name of the individual.

lastName.description: The last name of the individual.

zipCode.description: The postal code of the individual's address.

location.description: The city or location of the individual.

insuranceId.description: The insurance identification number of the individual.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the individual.

telephone.description: The telephone number of the individual.

email.description: The email address of the individual.

licensePlate.description: The license plate number of the individual's vehicle.
